sourcesContent:
import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react'; import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Button, Card, ListGroupItem } from 'react-bootstrap'; import Rating from '../components/Rating'; //import products from '../products'; import axios from 'axios' function ProductScreen() { const [product, setProduct] = useState([]) const {id} = useParams() useEffect(() => { async function fetchProduct() { const headers = { 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin': '*' } // replace * with your desired domain const { data } = await axios.get(`/api/product/${id}`, { headers }); setProduct(data) } fetchProduct() }, []) return
Go Back

{product.name}

Price: ${product.price}
{product.description}
 Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out of Stock'}
; } export default ProductScreen;
